review: mass effect 2 is an action rpg from bioware that continues the mass effect series  the storytelling and characters are extremely well done and decisions that you make have a big impact on the story and your relationships with the other characters  this entry in the series is also available as part of the mass effect legendary edition here on steam
masterpiece

me2 is an enjoyable journey the story and companions garrus is still the best and thane is my new favourite character and the scifi settings are all great it definitely lacks the details of me1 in terms of customization and being able to travel to planets and collect resources never care about it before anyway but still and i do miss walking around the presidium and hearing the menu theme of m1   nevertheless its still a great game 910

miranda sucks she ruined the whole mood i wish there was mod where she never existed i hate her so much i blame her for the ending i dont care i couldnt even finish the game cause i was devestated i hate mirandaaaaaaaaaa
one of those games i wish never ended
great to play amazing story

i never got to finish this game when it came out because my friend wanted his disc back haha i am so glad i played this now its so good a little different from me1 but great story still holds up gameplay dated but good i miss games like this miranda is also trash tali forever 3

i wont bother you with a full review the game is good and it still holds up today the story is good the companions are interesting and narratively it still packs a punch  but it is not the perfect game most people advocate for it has flaws a mediocre combat that is frustrating in some cases the leveling up the economy the upgrades all are so old and surpassed by other games  bottom line nostalgia is good but if you take out these goggles the game is just good not perfect
gud game old tho
cerberus network is broken and all dlc with it trash now
yes
unlike the legendary edition mirandas ass is here
fails to run via proton with ea app
yes yes yes old school shepard
go ahead

the second game in the trilogy you must upload your mass effect 1 save to get certain things in the second game there is some issues with rolling over your me1 saves and sometimes you will need to do a little file shifting to get me2 to see your me1 saves uploading your me1 saves are easy to fix if the config utility doesnt do it for you if youre going to buy this game you might as well buy all three and the dlc its worth it
great game   good story nice crew and fun talks d

i forgot how old this game is the combat style was a pain to play again in 2025 but the story is really good giving it a thumbs up because of nostalgia and narrative this might just be the type of game you need to play because its old and unique
well written with each of your choices genuinely affecting things later on in the game lots of fun to roleplay
as far as a standalone game it is probably the best in the mass effect series  great entry to the series perhaps bioware should let game desingers make their games again instead of ceos
just buy it
the game is great but you should consider spending more to get the legendary edition which is effectively the entire trilogy
despite ea still a fun game

game just crashes after certain missions and you cant finish them at all but have to load a save file much earlier if youre lucky to have one got stuck so many times after encountering weird clipping bugs and had to revert to older saves i dont say this often but literally unplayable
in my opinion its the best game of all time until baldurs gate 3 now its more debatable depending on preference
cool game
one of the best rpgs ive every played

the game is great  good story  good dialogue  decisions that feel like they actually matter  but theres 1 issue  a bug  if you launch the game through steam certain dlc questlines will hardlock your progress by continually crashing at the end of the mission  the workaround for this is launching the game via the ea launcher  wich is a dumb bug with a dumb workaround that i feel is almost intentional
great game
my favourite trilogy of scifi games
buy it

i have done my first playthrough i must say felt like i was a movie character nice upgrade of the first installment but still feel like there were stuff missing in the game one thing i loved is that i could import my character to continue with him
1 of 3 greatest games ever made

i absolutely loved this game this was my first playthrough and all i can say is that if you enjoyed me1 then buckle up because me2 goes above and beyond its predecessor the game reunites shepard with companions from me1 and introduces you to a whole new assortment of complex and interesting companions and dont even get me started on the suicide mission finale i was sitting on the edge of my chair the entire time i could not recommend this series enough
visual quality is good and the game play is like a story that you make choices and it affects everything
i bought game with dlcs but cannot activate them cuz of there is no cerberus key fuck ea
